net.adamcin.commons.testing.sling

Class SlingServerSideTestsBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.sling.testing.tools.sling.SlingTestBase
      • net.adamcin.commons.testing.sling.SlingServerSideTestsBase

  • public class SlingServerSideTestsBase
extends org.apache.sling.testing.tools.sling.SlingTestBase
    Test server-side tests using the Sling JUnit servlet, as opposed to the plain JUnit servlet.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String SERVLET_NODE_PATH
      Path to node that maps to Sling JUnit servlet
      static String SLING_JUNIT_SERVLET_PATH
      Path used to request the Sling JUnit servlet

      • Fields inherited from class org.apache.sling.testing.tools.sling.SlingTestBase

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SlingServerSideTestsBase()
      Before running tests, setup a node that gives access to the Sling JUnit servlet, and check (with timeout) that the servlet is ready
